description: This file contains performance benchmarks for target device classes. The AI uses this data to make informed decisions about performance budgets and feature feasibility.

highEnd.description: High-End Devices: Latest flagship phones and powerful desktops. Users expect a flawless, instant experience.

midRange.description: Mid-Range Devices: Popular, cost-effective smartphones from the last 1-3 years. This is the primary target group for optimization.

lowEnd.description: Low-End Devices: Older or budget smartphones, often with slower CPUs and limited memory. The theme must remain functional and usable.

notes: Benchmarks are targets for a standard Shopify store homepage. Values should be regularly reviewed against real-world data from tools like SpeedCurve or Google Analytics.
